import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AppStateService} from "../services/app-state.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-app-errors', templateUrl: './app-errors.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app-errors.component.css'] }) export class AppErrorsComponent { constructor(public appState : AppStateService) { } }
